title: Flextype
description: Build fast, flexible, easier to manage websites with Flextype.
keywords: flextype, php, cms, flat-file cms, flat cms, flatfile cms, html

media.accept_file_types: gif, jpg, jpeg, png, ico, zip, tgz, txt, md, doc, docx, pdf, epub, xls, xlsx, ppt, pptx, mp3, ogg, wav, m4a, mp4, m4v, ogv, wmv, avi, webm, svg
